decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwellinghouse.  REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 4.1, 5.5 and 5.9 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with policies 4.1 and 5.9 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004).
